reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Sundowner Cruises | Iconic Whitsunday Adventures (owner)4 months agoHi RiverWe are very sorry you have had this experience with our partner restaurant, as this is very out of the ordinary. Grateful for the good review of our Sundowner Cruise, where we consistently deliver great experiences!I can confirm that we definitely did book the restaurant for you, but that at the time the restaurant had changed booking systems and there were some teething problems. We will definitely discuss this whole issue with them, as we know that the owners and managers would not want their guests to feel this way.We do hope you'll give them and us another chance, next time you are visiting Airlie Beach.
reviews.author: Customer
